metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16477 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A bypass vulnerability in Active Storage >= 5.2.0 for Google Cloud Storageand Disk services allow an attacker to modify the `content-disposition` and`content-type` parameters which can be used in with HTML files and havethem executed inline. Additionally, if combined with other techniques suchas cookie bombing and specially crafted AppCache manifests, an attacker cangain access to private signed URLs within a specific storage path. Thisvulnerability has been fixed in version 5.2.1.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-activesupport-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
